projects.title: Personal Website
projects.preview_description: This project encompasses all the work I did to create the website you see now.
projects.description: I needed a unified space to display my projects to peers and prospective employers. I decided to make this website to address this need. Although I have used services like WordPress and Bootstrap in the past, I decided to develop all the code for this website myself because I wanted to make this site highly-personalized. This website is comprised of a static set of pages hosted through Cloudflare. Although I am familiar with backend development, I decided not to go beyond frontend for this website.

projects.title: Terra Bomber
projects.preview_description: Using Godot game engine I made a 2D puzzle platformer game that I published.
projects.description: Terra Bomber came about through me learning about the world of game development. I spent time learning how to design 2D pixel art with tools like Aesprite, writing code in Godot’s native language, GDscript, and learning how to effectively structure a project of this size. Although I enjoyed creating the Terra Bomber project, I believe game development will  remain a hobby for me. My key takeaways from developing this project were Git for structuring and version control, as this was one of my first times interacting with my own repository. In connection to Git, I have posted the game’s entire source code on GitHub, and I also have a runnable instance of the game on itch.io.
